name: Dark Unreal Tournament Forums V1 (Old)
description:
This is now an OLD version as the UT forum got updated to a new version.
New style can be found here: https://userstyles.org/styles/141358/dark-unreal-tournament-forums-v2-2017 

This css style modifies the colors of the Unreal Tournament forums to darker colors. The darker colors are easier on the eyes.
